page.title: 05THE LIME KILN
page.content: LIME IS USED FOR BUILDING, FERTILIZER OR TO WHITEWASH HOUSES.IN BELLEEK THERE IS A LIME KILN KNOWN AS GRAYSONS.IT WAS A COMMERCIAL KILN LINED WITH FIRESTONE.THERE WERE MANY KILNS OVER THE COUNTRY BUT NONE AS BIG AS THIS ONE.ALTERNATE LAYERS OF TURF AND STONE WERE INSERTED AND A PILLAR OF TURF WAS BUILT UP THE CENTRE OF THE KILN AS A WICK TO KEEP THE KILN BURNING. WHEN THE KILN IS SET ALIGHT IT MIGHT TAKE SEVERAL DAYS BEFORE IT WAS FINISHED BURNING AND HAD TO BE ATTENDED NEARLY ALL THE TIME TO CONTROL THE AIR SUPPLY THE QUARRY FOR THE LIMESTONE WAS NEARBY.A MAN WAS PAID TO BREAK THE STONE BECAUSE IT WOULD NOT BURN IN BIG PIECES.THE LIMESTONE AROUND BELLEEK IS A PURE FORM OF LIMESTONE AND MAKES VERY GOOD LIME.IT HAS NOT BEEN USED FOR MANY YEARS AND IS NOW OVERGROWN WITH BRIARS
